initialSetup.question2: Are you already employed in Korea?
initialSetup.question3: Which visa do you plan to obtain?

modalTitle.noJob: You're not working in Korea yet

modalSubtitle.hasJob: We’ll help you adjust to life in Korea!
modalSubtitle.noJob: We’ll guide you from the beginning!

initialSetup.visaModalSubtitle: We will now take you through the onboarding steps for your journey.

home.title: WorkerBridge
home.subtitle: Your gateway to a career in Korea
home.description: We help you navigate the Korean job market—from writing your CV to interview tips.
home.calculator_description: This service helps estimate the approximate cost needed for preparing employment in Korea.
home.onboarding_description: Provides step-by-step guidance on the procedures and documents required for foreigners preparing to work in Korea by visa type.
home.chatbot_description: Using an NLP model, this service provides multilingual support to help foreign workers consult about visas, employment, and life in Korea in their native language.

calculator.title: Employment Preparation Cost Estimator
calculator.description: Estimate the approximate costs required to prepare for working in Korea.

guide.check: Tap 'Check' if you've completed this step.
guide.next: Tap 'Next' to proceed to the next step.
guide.progress: Tap the progress bar to view or jump to another step.
guide.calculator: You can estimate the cost of preparing for employment using the calculator.

1.title: Let's check the basic eligibility
checklist: Are you between 18 and 39 years old?
Do you have no criminal record and no disqualification for departure?
Are you in good health without contagious or serious illness?
Are you not banned from working abroad or returning from overseas work?

3.title: Register as a job seeker (EPS registration)
checklist: Ensure mobile verification is possible and visit the agency
Fill out the application form and submit the documents

5.title: Check whether your name is listed in the EPS job seeker list

6.title: Proceed with employment matching and contract

7.title: Receive the Certificate for Visa Issuance

10.title: Pack the necessary documents and depart

11.title: Within 15 days of entering Korea, complete job training and medical checkup

12.title: Assigned to workplace and start working
